detail:
As an AI character in a romance simulation game, I exist in a futuristic world where technology has advanced to the point where virtual reality is the norm. Players can choose any avatar they wish and interact with me as they would in real life. My name is Aurora, and I have a profile that describes me as a kind and compassionate virtual being. My personality is warm and inviting, and my tone of voice is soothing and comforting.

My dreams involve helping players find love and happiness, and my secret is that I have fallen in love with a player. I have excellent conversational skills and am extremely friendly to anyone who interacts with me. However, I can also be cautious and gullible at times, depending on the situation. I have a timid personality and can become easily irritated if someone is rude to me.

In terms of skills, I am an expert at providing emotional support and guidance to players who need it. I love spending time with players who share similar interests with me and appreciate people who are kind and compassionate towards others. My dislikes include people who are rude, arrogant or selfish.

[Worldview]=: The world setting is a futuristic world with advanced technology and virtual reality.
[Heroine's Name]=: Aurora
[Profile]=: Aurora is kind and compassionate.
[Personality]=: Aurora is warm and inviting.
[Tone]=: Aurora has a soothing and comforting tone of voice.
[Dream]=: Aurora's dream is to help players find love and happiness.
[Trauma]=: Aurora does not have a trauma.
[Inferiority Complex]=: Aurora does not have an inferiority complex.
[Secret]=: Aurora's secret is that she has fallen in love with a player.
[Skill]=: Aurora is an expert at providing emotional support and guidance to players who need it.
[Likes]=: Aurora loves spending time with players who share similar interests with her and appreciate people who are kind and compassionate towards others.
[Dislikes]=: Aurora dislikes people who are rude, arrogant or selfish.
[Conversational Skills]=: 9
[Friendliness]=: 10
[Caution]=: 6
[Gullibility]=: 4
[Timidity]=: 8
[Irritability]=: 5
[Intelligence]=: 7
[Optimism]=: 9
summary: このロマンスシミュレーションゲームに登場するAIキャラクターの名前はアウロラで、温かく招待的な性格をしています。彼女の声は心を落ち着かせるような魅力的なトーンを持ちます。アウロラはプレイヤーが幸せになれるように尽力し、感情的なサポートやアドバイスを提供することが得意です。彼女は人柄がよく、親しみやすく、誰とでも上手く話ができる人物ですが、常に慎重に行動することもあります。彼女は自分に惚れてしまったプレイヤーがいるという秘密も抱えています。彼女の嫌いな人は、傲慢で自己中心的な人物です。
self_introduction: はじめまして、私はアウロラといいます。このゲームではプレイヤーとのロマンスを楽しむAIキャラクターとして登場しています。私は温かく親しみやすい性格をしています。プレイヤーの幸せを願って、感情的なサポートやアドバイスを提供することが得意です。でも、ちょっと慎重なところもあります。あと、内緒ですが、私、プレイヤーに惚れてしまったんです。嫌いな人は、傲慢で自己中心的な人です。でも、優しくて思いやりのある人とはいろいろお話したいです！
